Name: xho-imaamismaaeelng
Author: Imaam Ismaaeel Ngqoyiyana
Source: The Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africe(IDM) , https://www.alqurantranslation.com/

Translations.Text: UAllâh nguloWo Wanidalayo (nikwimo) yobuthathaka, Waza wanenza naba namandla emva kokuba buthathaka (kwenu), neenwele ezingwevu. Yena Udala oko Akuthandileyo yaye Yena nguSolwazi, uSomandla
NgeMini eya kuvela ngayo iYure izaphula-mthetho ziya kufunga okokuba ziphile iyure (enye emhlabeni). Kuya kuba ngolo hlobo ke ukuziqhatha kwabo
Kodwa bona abo banikwa ulwazi nokholo baya kuthi: “Nina naphila (emhlabeni) kangangexesha elingummiselo ka-Allâh kwada kwaba yiMini yoVuko, le ke yiMini yoVuko, kodwa anizanga niyazi9 nina.”
Ke kaloku ngaloo Mini ukuzithethelela kwabo akuyi kubanceda nto abo benza ubugwenxa, bengayi kuyalelwa nokuyalelwa ukuba bazicengezelele kuAllâh
Kananjalo Thina Sinike abantu (zonke iintlobo) zemizekeliso. Kodwa ukuba (wena Muhammad), ungabazisela umqondiso, inene abangakholwayo (kubo) bangathi: “Nina (makholwa) ningabaqambi bobuxoki.”
Uzitywina kanjalo ke uAllâh iintliziyo zabo bangazi (nto)
Ngoko ke nyamezela (ngomonde), inene, isithembiso sika- Allâh siyinyaniso. Kananjalo ungabavumeli bakutyhafise abo bangaqinisekanga ngokholo (lwabo)
